Plot: The daughter of a brilliant but mentally disturbed mathematician, recently deceased, tries to come to grips with her possible inheritance: his insanity. Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students, who wants to search through his papers, and her estranged sister, who shows up to help settle his affairs.
Title: Proof
Writer: David Auburn (play), David Auburn (screenplay), Rebecca Miller (screenplay)
Actors: Gwyneth Paltrow, Anthony Hopkins, Jake Gyllenhaal, Danny McCarthy
tomatoConsensus: Gwyneth Paltrow and Anthony Hopkins give exceptional performances in a film that intelligently tackles the territory between madness and genius.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.
